abstract.text: A protocol describing traits that can be added to a test function or to a
test suite.

abstract.text: A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
Create and run tests for your Swift packages and Xcode projects.
A type representing a bug report tracked by a test.
A type representing a comment related to a test.
A type that defines a condition which must be satisfied for a test to be
enabled.
A type that affects whether or not a test or suite is parallelized.
A protocol describing traits that can be added to a test suite.
A type representing one or more tags applied to a test.
A protocol that allows providing a custom execution scope for a test
function (and each of its cases) or a test suite by performing custom code
before or after it runs.
